net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Class CompositeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator
      • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.CompositeValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator

    public final class CompositeValidator
extends AbstractValidator
    A validator based on the validation of one or more other validator instances. The default behavior is to pass anything.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Detail

      • getValidators

        public Validator[] getValidators()
        Get the validators.
        Returns:
        Returns the validators.

      • isComponentValidationSupported

        public boolean isComponentValidationSupported(Component component)
        All validators must support the component in order to return true. Determine if this validator instance can be used with the given component.
        Parameters:
        component - The component.
        Returns:
        true if this validator supports the given component, otherwise false.

      • isPassAll

        public boolean isPassAll()
        Get whether the component must pass all validators, or only one. The default value is true.
        Returns:
        true if a component must pass all validators or false if only one validator needs to pass.

      • of

        public static Validator of(Validator... validators)
        Create a validator from the arguments. If all are null or the list is empty, an instance of PassAllValidator is returned. If exactly one is non-null, that validator is returned. Otherwise a composite validator is returned.
        Parameters:
        validators - the validators.
        Returns:
        Validator.

      • setPassAll

        public void setPassAll(boolean passAll)
        Set whether the component must pass all validators, or only one. The default value is true.
        Parameters:
        passAll - true if a component must pass all validators or false if only one validator needs to pass.

      • setValidators

        public void setValidators(Validator[] validators)
        Set the validators.
        Parameters:
        validators - The validators to set.

      • validate

        public boolean validate(Component component,
               net.proteusframework.core.notification.Notifiable notifiable)
        Description copied from interface: Validator
        Validate the specified component.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to validate.
        notifiable - the notifiable to send notifications.
        Returns:
        true if the component data is valid, otherwise false.
